title: Show me English: a visit to hospital [episode 4]
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants to communicate in everyday situations. The receptionist at a large hospital gives directions to Tina on how to find the Pathology Department. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.
